### In
Time series data allows estimation of the effect on  Y of a change in  X over time.
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(AER)
library(dynlm)
library(forecast)
library(readxl)
library(stargazer)
library(scales)
library(quantmod)
library(urca)
```

```{r}

data(CASchools)
CASchools$STR <- CASchools$students/CASchools$teachers       
CASchools$score <- (CASchools$read + CASchools$math)/2

mod <- lm(score ~ STR, data = CASchools)
mod

```
